Love Bandit is an adventure of two boys , Ellis and his friend neckbone , who find a man named Mud ( Matthew McConaughey ) hiding on an island in the Mississippi . He says he plans to find the love of your life and get away with it , Juniper , who is waiting for him in the city . Skeptical , but intrigued , Ellis and neckbone agree to help him. Before long predictions come true and Mud small town to see a beautiful girl and a row of bounty hunters ready.
